org.emath.persistence.hibernate
Interface DatabaseFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
HibernateImpl
public interface DatabaseFacade

This interface defines the contract for the persistence layer of the e-math server-side system.

Method Summary

          Gives the User with userId access to the Exam with examId until validUntil.

requestLock

int requestLock(Course course,
                User user)
Adds a new Lock to the Course for the User and returns the lock id.

Parameters:
course - The course that the lock is added for
user - The user who requested the lock
Returns:
Database id

removeLock

int removeLock(java.lang.String lockId,
               Course course,
               User user)
Removes the lock with the given data.

Parameters:
lockId - The database id of the lock
course - The course that the lock is for
user - The user who requested the lock
Returns:
1 if successful, else -1

getSolutions

java.util.List<AssignmentSolution> getSolutions(Course course,
                                                User user,
                                                java.util.Date lastUpdateTime)
Gets all AssignmentSolutions by User and Course that were received after lastUpdateTime.

Parameters:
course - The course
user - The user
lastUpdateTime - Only newer solutions than this are being fetched.
Returns:
A list of AssignmentSolutions

getNextStudentNumber

java.lang.String getNextStudentNumber(int schoolId,
                                      int gender)
Counts the students of the School with the schoolId and returns the next number that can be assigned to a student.

Parameters:
schoolId - The id of the School
gender - 1 for boy, 2 for girl
Returns:
The number as a String with leading zero if number < 10

getNextTeacherNumber

java.lang.String getNextTeacherNumber(int schoolId)
Counts the teachers of the School with the schoolId and returns the next number that can be assigned to a teacher.

Parameters:
schoolId - The id of the School
Returns:
The number as a String with leading zero if number < 10

getNextSchoolNumber

int getNextSchoolNumber(java.lang.String country)
Counts the schools of the country (i.e. 'FI') and returns the next number that can be assigned to a school.

Parameters:
country - FI, EE, ...
Returns:
The next number

isUserInCourse

boolean isUserInCourse(User user,
                       int courseId)
Returns true, if user is teacher or student in the course, else returns false.

Parameters:
user - The user to check
courseId - The course id
Returns:
true/false

getBookUpdates

java.util.List<BookUpdate> getBookUpdates(Course course,
                                          User user,
                                          java.util.Date date,
                                          java.lang.String lang)
Gets all BookUpdates, language specific BookUpdates or language generic BookUpdates based on the lang parameter by date and course that were received after lastUpdateTime. user is used to specify the role of the user.

Parameters:
course - The course
user - The User
date - Last update time
lang - null for generic updates, lang code for language specific BookUpdates or the keyword 'all' for all BookUpdates
Returns:
A list of BookUpdates

addLogEntry

void addLogEntry(int type,
                 int userId,
                 int courseId,
                 java.lang.String data,
                 java.lang.String ip,
                 java.lang.String extraParams)
Adds a new entry to the log that is being used to log unsuccesful authentication attempts.

Parameters:
type - The type of request
userId - The id of the user if user with submitted userHash and password exists
courseId - The id of the course
data - The content of the data parameter of the request
ip - The ip address of the client that sent the request
extraParams - Additional info

addTrafficLogEntry

void addTrafficLogEntry(int userId,
                        java.lang.String ip,
                        java.lang.String extraParams)
Adds a new entry to the traffic log that is used to log every received request.

Parameters:
userId - The id of the user that made the request.
ip - The ip address of the client
extraParams - Additional info

getExamById

Exam getExamById(int id)
Gets an Exam by id.

Parameters:
id - Database id
Returns:
The Exam object or null if exam doesn't exist

addExamAccess

void addExamAccess(int userId,
                   int examId,
                   java.util.Date validUntil)
Gives the User with userId access to the Exam with examId until validUntil.

Parameters:
userId - The id of the User
examId - The id of the Exam
validUntil - The Date until which the Exam can be accessed by the User.

getExamAccess

ExamAccess getExamAccess(int userId,
                         int examId)
Returns the ExamAccess on base of userId and examId or null if it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
userId - The id of the User
examId - The id of the Exam
Returns:
ExamAccess object or null.

getDummySystemUpdates

java.util.List<DummySystemUpdate> getDummySystemUpdates(java.lang.String bookVersion,
                                                        int updateType,
                                                        java.util.Date lastUpdateTime)
Returns DummySystemUpdates for a dummy book.

Parameters:
bookVersion - Is the unique dummy book identifier
updateType - 0 for teacher book, 1 for student book
lastUpdateTime - The time when the book instance was updated last time
Returns:
A list of DummySystemUpdates.

getSystemUpdateByTitle

SystemUpdate getSystemUpdateByTitle(java.lang.String title)
Returns the SystemUpdate with the given title or null if there is no SystemUpdate with the given title.

Parameters:
title - The title attribute
Returns:
SystemUpdate || null

getBookUpdateByTitle

BookUpdate getBookUpdateByTitle(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String lang)
Returns the BookUpdate with the given title or null if there is no BookUpdate with the given title.

Parameters:
title - The title attribute
Returns:
BookUpdate || null
